revision.text:
__NOTOC__ ==NetBeans FAQ Index==
===General FAQs and troubleshooting tips===
* [[NetBeansUserFAQ| NetBeans User FAQ]] - Installation, configuration, packs, usage, community.
* [[FaqArchive|FAQ Archive]] - Questions and answers for NetBeans IDE 5.5 or older
===FAQs for specific technologies===
* [[NetBeansDeveloperFAQ| NetBeans Platform Developer FAQ]] - NetBeans plugins and rich-client applications * [[NetBeansVWPUserFAQ| NetBeans Visual Web Pack FAQ]] (Web Application Development) * [[NetBeansSOAUserFAQ| NetBeans SOA FAQ]] (Service Oriented Architecture) * [[NetBeansUserFAQ#NetBeansCCDevelopmentPack| NetBeans C/C++ Pack FAQ]] * [[NetBeansUserFAQ#NetBeansMobilityPack| NetBeans Mobility Pack FAQ]] (Java ME) * [[RubyFAQ| NetBeans Ruby Support FAQ]] * [[JavaScriptDebuggerFAQ| NetBeans JavaScript Debugger FAQ]] * [[NBIFAQ| NetBeans Installer FAQ]]
===System requirements and ''Known Issues'' in the Release Notes by Version===
====NetBeans IDE 6 ====
* [http://www.netbeans.org/community/releases/61/relnotes.html NetBeans IDE 6.1 Release Notes] * [http://www.netbeans.org/community/releases/60/relnotes.html NetBeans IDE 6.0.1 Release Notes]
====NetBeans IDE 5.5.1 ====
* [http://www.netbeans.org/community/releases/55/1/relnotes.html NetBeans IDE 5.5.1 Release Notes] * [http://www.netbeans.org/community/releases/55/1/vwp-release-notes.html#knownissues NetBeans Visual Web Pack 5.5.1 Release Notes] * [http://www.netbeans.org/community/releases/55/1/relnotes-mobility.html NetBeans Mobility Pack for CLDC 5.5.1 Release Notes] * [http://www.netbeans.org/community/releases/55/1/relnotes-mobilitycdc.html NetBeans Mobility Pack for CDC 5.5.1 Release Notes] * [http://www.netbeans.org/community/releases/55/1/cnd-release-notes.html NetBeans C/C++ Development Pack 5.5.1 Release Notes] * [http://www.netbeans.org/community/releases/55/1/uml-relnotes.html NetBeans IDE 5.5.1 UML Modeling Release Notes] * [http://profiler.netbeans.org/download/prev/551_relnotes.html NetBeans IDE 5.5.1 Profiler Release Notes]
====NetBeans IDE 5.5==== * [http://www.netbeans.org/community/releases/55/relnotes.html#known_issues NetBeans IDE 5.5 Release Notes] * [http://www.netbeans.org/community/releases/55/entpack_relnotes.html#known_issues NetBeans Enterprise Pack 5.5 Release Notes] * [http://www.netbeans.org/community/releases/55/vwp-release-notes.html#knownissues NetBeans Visual Web Pack 5.5 Release Notes] * [http://www.netbeans.org/community/releases/55/relnotes-mobility.html NetBeans Mobility Pack 5.5 Release Notes] * [http://www.netbeans.org/community/releases/55/cnd-release-notes.html NetBeans C/C++ Development Pack 5.5 Release Notes] * [http://www.netbeans.org/community/releases/55/uml-relnotes.html NetBeans IDE 5.5 UML Modeling Release Notes] * [http://profiler.netbeans.org/download/prev/55_relnotes.html NetBeans IDE 5.5 Profiler Release Notes]
Do you want to know [[HowToAddFAQEntries | How To Add FAQ Entries]] ?
